info.name: MyAnimeList: Dark and Flat (!important] overrides)
info.description: This is supposedly a fix for style 101557 for users who are experiencing problems with the style on Chrome. It basically appends !important tags to all tags, credits to Rsslone. Try it out if it works for you, and please provide feedback below if it works or not.
info.additionalInfo: Credits to Rsslone for discovering the fix and appending the !important properties to tags.
